Package org.logi.crypto.sign

Hashing data and holding fingerprints, signatures and blind signatures.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BlindFingerprint This class is used to hold a blinded fingerprint of a particular data buffer.
BlindingFactor Information used for blinding a fingerprint and unblinding a signature for a particular keypair.
BlindSignature This class stores a blinded digital signature.
Fingerprint This class is used to hold a fingerprint of a particular data buffer.
HashState An subclasses of this object handle the status of a fingerprint still being calculated.
MD5State An object of this class holds the state of an MD5 fingerprint still being calculated.
MD5State.SubState MD5 function without the padding.
SHA1State An object of this class holds the state of a SHA-1 fingerprint still being calculated.
Signature This class stores a digital signature.
 

Package org.logi.crypto.sign Description

Hashing data and holding fingerprints, signatures and blind signatures.
